bio:
I am an enthusiastic undergraduate Software Engineering student at SLIIT with a strong focus on crafting meaningful digital experiences. My work spans across UI/UX design, Full Stack Development and mobile app development, allowing me to combine creative thinking with technical precision.

I’m passionate about understanding real user needs and transforming them into clean, intuitive, and functional products. Whether it’s designing a modern interface, developing responsive web applications, or building smooth mobile experiences, I aim to deliver solutions that are both visually appealing and technically robust.

I enjoy exploring new technologies, staying updated with industry trends, and continuously improving my craft. With a detail-oriented mindset and a drive for excellence, I’m committed to producing high-quality work that reflects professionalism, clarity, and innovation.

My goal is to grow as a versatile developer and designer while contributing to impact digital solutions that make a difference.

education.place: Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology
